医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
使用基于成像、临床和 DNA 甲基化生物标志物的机器学习模型检测早期肺癌研究人员讨论了肺癌早期诊断组合模型的开发和验证。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Early-lung-cancer-detection-with-a-machine-learning-model-based-on-imaging-clinical-and-DNA-methylation-biomarkers。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Early-lung-cancer-detection-with-a-machine-learning-model-based-on-imaging-clinical-and-DNA-methylation-biomarkers。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=02b51ee5-881e-48c7-905a-3ae900e2a4bb Tue, 15 Aug 2023 10:37:00 -0400 Early lung cancer detection with a machine learning model based on imaging, clinical, and DNA methylation biomarkers
免疫、神经系统和微生物群之间的相互作用研究人员回顾了肠道微生物群对神经和免疫网络的影响https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/The-interplay- Between-immunity-the-nervous-system-and-microbiota.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/The-interplay- Between-immunity-the-nervous-system-and-microbiota.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72a31c29-e749-42e6-85cc-ab3b84d1b80a Tue, 15 Aug 2023 10:24:00 -0400 The interplay between immunity, the nervous system, and microbiota

表观遗传操作可以改善乳腺癌治疗反应研究人员探索通过增强癌细胞上 TROP2 的表达来增加 TROP2 ADC 活性的可能性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Epigenic-manipulation-may-improve-breast-cancer-treatment-responses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Epigenic-manipulation-may-improve-breast-cancer-treatment-responses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da0d4c29-a064-4586-9f5f-69faa92bcd63 Tue, 15 Aug 2023 09:58:00 -0400 Epigenetic manipulation may improve breast cancer treatment responses
研究表明，COVID-19 疫苗接种可减少但并不能完全改善 COVID-19 后糖尿病发病率过高的情况研究人员调查了 COVID-19 及其疫苗接种对 2 型糖尿病发病率和持续性的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Study-shows-COVID-19-vaccination-reduces-but-does-not-entirely-ameliorate-excess-diabetes-incidence-after-COVID-19。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Study-shows-COVID-19-vaccination-reduces-but-does-not-entirely-ameliorate-excess-diabetes-incidence-after-COVID-19。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8dc3ef70-7850-496e-a4b8-b969b7f3841f Tue, 15 Aug 2023 09:47:00 -0400 Study shows COVID-19 vaccination reduces, but does not entirely ameliorate, excess diabetes incidence after COVID-19
研究人员开发了可大规模生产 SARS-CoV-2 mRNA 脂质纳米颗粒疫苗的平台研究人员提出了一个可扩展的脂质纳米颗粒生产 (SCALAR) 平台，用于开发 SARS-CoV-2 mRNA 脂质纳米颗粒疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Researchers-develop-platform-allowing-mass-scale-product-of-SARS-CoV-2-mRNA-lipid-nanoarticle-vaccines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Researchers-develop-platform-allowing-mass-scale-product-of-SARS-CoV-2-mRNA-lipid-nanoarticle-vaccines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5057cc57-7f80-4375-97ba-db113a337f64 Tue, 15 Aug 2023 09:44:00 -0400 Researchers develop platform allowing mass-scale production of SARS-CoV-2 mRNA lipid nanoparticle vaccines
深度学习框架 DeepAIR 可以提高对适应性免疫的理解研究人员提出了一种深度学习框架 DeepAIR，可以准确预测适应性免疫受体 (AIR) 与抗原的结合。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Deep-learning-framework-DeepAIR-could-improve-understanding-of-adaptive-immunity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Deep-learning-framework-DeepAIR-could-improve-understanding-of-adaptive-immunity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5370bb51-3e8a-45f7-b8c9-425976a468d3 Tue, 15 Aug 2023 09:37:00 -0400 Deep learning framework DeepAIR could improve understanding of adaptive immunity
新发现的蛋白激酶有望建立未来的肥胖和糖尿病治疗方法研究人员使用转基因动物模型来研究新发现的 Traf2 和 NCK 相互作用蛋白激酶 (TNIK) 在肥胖和代谢功能障碍中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Newly-discovered- Protein-kinase-shows-promise-for-builting-future-obesity-and-diabetes-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Newly-discovered- Protein-kinase-shows-promise-for-builting-future-obesity-and-diabetes-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c1eb1903-88a5-4111-9b4a-29bd35b89017 Tue, 15 Aug 2023 09:32:00 -0400 Newly discovered protein kinase shows promise for establishing future obesity and diabetes treatments

研究探讨跨膜粘蛋白对 SARS-CoV-2 感染的保护作用最近的一项研究分析了宿主粘蛋白和粘蛋白聚糖在 SARS-CoV-2 进入气道上皮细胞中所发挥的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Study-explores-the-protective-effect-of-transmembrane-mucins-against-SARS-CoV-2-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Study-explores-the-protective-effect-of-transmembrane-mucins-against-SARS-CoV-2-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6d4dd008-808a-4f6e-a4d7-731a1fc29255 Tue, 15 Aug 2023 09:10:00 -0400 Study explores the protective effect of transmembrane mucins against SARS-CoV-2 infection
